main.name: Jaehyeon Park
main.description: Music Producer turned to a developer.
main.bio: Hi there! I am Jay! As a Full Stack developer I've worked with a startup for MVP, called typebeat which is a music marketplace platform. I like to work on any position, front-end, middle-tier and back-end. I mostly use React.js for the front-end, C# .Net Core and SQL for the back end. Currently I'm a support engineer at Microsoft, can't wait to see where my next journey will be!
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for more details!

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree, Electronic Production & Sound Design

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: A music marketplace web platform application allows users and artists have different features and profiles depending on the each role so the typebeat uses role based routing, there are three roles admin, user and artist, and each role will have an access to the specific routes in the application so users can't access to the artist's route or features. and basically users can browse and purchase the contents in the application, and artists can upload and sell their unique contents.

testimonials.text: Jay is absolutely excellent, his attitude towards work, skills & quick and willing to learn really made him an awesome developer. I would definitely recommend
Learning with Jay has been AWESOME, he picks and learn so quickly React, C#, SQL etc..
